title: Resisting AUKUS & War on China -  a conversation with Noam Chomsky and others
description: In responding to the AUKUS agreement we have to educate ourselves about what it means, what to do about it and how to do something about it.  We are very pleased to have the world famous Noam Chomsky  on side.  We also have Dr Lisa Natividad from the US colony of Guam, Steven Murphy of the AMWU, Nat Wasley Environmentalist, and Nick Deane of the Sydney Anti-AUKUS Coalition (SAAC).  An event organised by SAAC
